content:
Capture Informed Participant Consents with Flows

Eliminate complex paper-based processes using a structured digital approach to capture candidate consent. Customize the consent management process to meet your business needs and ensure it supports multiple languages and complies with all regulatory standards.

This feature helps clinical trial managers by streamlining the handling of consent versions and simplifying the process of capturing timestamps for easier regulatory reporting. It also supports both scribble signatures and signatures via user login credentials.

Where: This change applies to Lightning Experience in Enterprise and Unlimited editions with Life Sciences Cloud and Participant Enrollment Add-On license.

When: Available starting in June 2024.

Who: Users with Clinical Trial Manager permission set license have access to this feature.

How: From Setup, find participant management settings, turn on Participant Enrollment and Custom Sharing, enable Named Credentials. Clone and activate the built-in flow from Setup.
title: Participant Management in Salesforce for Clinical Trials
